Description: We are located in Central Illinois and have been in business for nearly 40 years. We carry products from some of the most respected manufacturers in the music industry including Fender, Vox, Dream Cymbals, Roland, Yamaha, Blackstar, Behringer, Takamine, ESP, Schecter, Shure, ADJ, Wampler, TC Electronic and more. Up for sale is a PRS S2 Single cut guitar w/PRS gig bag. Formerly owned by one of our teachers, this guitar plays and sounds great and weighs in at 7.9 lbs. It has some roughness to the finish that can be seen in the photos. Fretwear is visible, but action and intonation are excellent. With an understated, refined appearance, instant comfort and playability, and a voice that is familiar and captivating, the vintage-inspired S2 Singlecut is a guitar you won’t want to put down. Its mahogany body and asymmetrical, beveled maple top give the S2 Singlecut much of its explosive tone. And while not a super high output guitar, the S2 Singlecut can be overdriven into well-rounded, organic rock tones without sacrificing the punch or clarity found in higher-output guitars (or even active pickups). The bridge pickup is rich with some sparkle and substantial but tight low end, while the neck pickup is a little darker providing great balance and vintage tones. Sorry, no international shipping on this item. Please note, signature is required on all shipments. Please note: 20% restocking fee applies to returns for any reason that is not our fault. Business hours are M-F 10am-6pm, Sat 10am-4pm CST
Title: PRS USA S2 Single Cut Electric Guitar, Elephant Gray, w/gig bag
ConditionDescription: Plays and sounds great.  Some roughness to the finish (see pics).  Gig bag included.  Moderate fretwear.  7.9 lbs.
